configuration:
dfs.nameservices <%= node[:hadoop2][:cluster] %>
dfs.replication 2
dfs.replication.max 10
dfs.permissions.enabled false
dfs.domain.socket.path /var/run/hadoop2/dn_socket
dfs.hosts.exclude /etc/hadoop2/dfs.hosts.exclude
dfs.client.read.shortcircuit false
dfs.journalnode.edits.dir /var/app/hadoop2/storage/journalnode
dfs.namenode.name.dir file:///var/app/hadoop2/storage/namenode
dfs.namenode.handler.count 40
dfs.namenode.rpc-bind-host 0.0.0.0
dfs.datanode.data.dir file:///var/app/hadoop2/storage/datanode
dfs.datanode.balance.bandwidthPerSec 20971520
dfs.datanode.handler.count 40
dfs.datanode.du.reserved <%= node[:hadoop2][:du][:reserved] %>
<% if hadoop2_namenodes.count > 1 %>
dfs.ha.namenodes.<%= node[:hadoop2][:cluster] %> <%= hadoop2_namenodes.map { |n| "nn#{n[:cluster][:host][:id]}" }.join(',') %>
dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir qjournal://<%= hadoop2_journalnodes.map { |n| "#{n[:fqdn]}:8485" }.join(";") %>/<%= node[:hadoop2][:cluster] %>
dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.<%= node[:hadoop2][:cluster] %> org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha.ConfiguredFailoverProxyProvider
dfs.ha.fencing.methods shell(/bin/true)
dfs.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
ha.zookeeper.quorum <%= zookeeper_connect('/hadoop2', node[:hadoop2][:cluster]) %>
<% hadoop2_namenodes.each do |n| %>
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.<%= node[:hadoop2][:cluster] %>.nn<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:8020
dfs.namenode.http-address.<%= node[:hadoop2][:cluster] %>.nn<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:50070
<% end %> <% end %>
